text:
e="preserve">Nepal Standard Time (NPT) is the time zone for Nepal. With a time offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) of, all over Nepal Standard Time is one of only three time zones with a 45-minute offset from
UTC. (The others are Chatham Island Standard Time, with an offset of, and the
unofficial Australian Central Western Time, with an offset of.) NPT is an approximation of Kathmandu mean time, which is 5:41:16 ahead of
UTC.
